name: Critical Core
description:
• CONTROLS:
    • W A S D - Movement
    • LEFT CLICK - Uses Ability 1
    • RIGHT CLICK - Uses Ability 2
  • OBJECTIVE:
    • Survive for as many rounds as you can by keeping the humans away from the core! When an enemy reaches the core 10 health will be lost and a certain amount will be regenerated on the next round depending on difficult.
    • You get kill the enemies by either walking into them or using your abilities.
  • ENEMIES:
    • Each new round more enemies (capped at 150) will spawn and theres 4 types of enemies;
    • Default: The default enemy is the white one with gray circle inside, doesn't have any special abilities.
    • Speed: Speed enemies are light blue and they're the fastest type of enemies.
    • Stunner: Green with an X in the middle of them, when you attempt to kill them by getting close you'll become slower for a short amount of time. You won't be stunned if you kill them with a projectile
    • Shield: They're light blue with a blue forcefield around them, the forcefield will protect any enemy inside of it from projectiles, the only way to kill shield enemies is by getting close to them.

This game was made for a school project and I enjoyed developing this and seeing it progress, I do plan on making some changes although they might not come out fast.

Any feedback is appreciated!

NOTE: All of the game functions & visuals are made by me EXCEPT for the sound effects, the music is from Ben 10: Galactic Racing & Ben 10 Game Creator. The sound effects are from the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure anime.

(Made using Javascript)
